Pioneers in software solutions for packaging manufacturers

Empower. Evolve. Excite.

Existing Customers
Because the Packaging Suite is designed specifically for the packaging industry, it fits what we do out-of-the-box. But with the enhancements EFI has developed over the years, our system is a true hand-in-glove solution.

Jonas Kretz, Group IT manager, A&R Carton

We have generated greater efficiencies through achieving tighter margins across the business.

Andrew Hartwig, Managing Director, Firststan Quality Packaging

We are linking shop floor data collection with AC4D and automated scheduling with PrintFlow to add more value and productivity gains to our Radius solution. It makes Netpak more efficient, and uniquely positions us against our competitors.

Georges Berbari, Chief Operating Officer, Netpak

Local Suite Software Solutions

Intuitive and Powerful Campaign Design

To stay ahead of the competition requires Packaging ERP solutions that simplify your processes, empower your people, and support sustained and profitable growth. At the same time, every department in your company must work faster, handle more work, and manage more change – the demands of the packaging industry, and its customers, will never stop. This requires a shift in strategy from optimizing each part of your business to considering your entire end-to-end workflow.

At EFI we have been helping companies manage the demands of the packaging industry for over thirty years. Our future-ready Packaging Manufacturing Software solutions, together with our purpose-built Packaging ERP solution, Radius, can help evolve your business, empower your customers, and build solid foundations for today- and tomorrow.

Integrated, automated, and scalable packaging manufacturing software solutions for label, folding carton, and flexible enterprises featuring EFI Radius, our award winning Packaging ERP System, at its core.​

Designed, built, and validated specifically for packaging manufacturing enterprises, the suite provides a powerful set of tools to optimize efficiencies, reduce cost of sales, and generate new revenue streams.

eCRM

The EFI eCRM capabilities extend the impact potential of your EFI management solution to your sales team, making them more productive and efficient. Our suite solutions enable rapid quoting and estimating helping you win more business by automating key administrative tasks.

Learn More →

ERP/MIS System

EFI Radius is a future-ready MIS/ERP solution that is purpose-built for the folding carton, label, and flexible packaging industries. A complete end-to-end business management solution, Radius integrates to a wide range of pre-press and digital print workflow providers.

Learn More →

Scheduling

Intelligently optimize the sequencing of jobs by evaluating the constraints of the production operation with PrintFlow. PrintFlow is a rules-based scheduling solution that allows you to automatically update the schedule to adjust for changes ensuring your production machinery is fully utilised.

Learn More →

Transport Management

As a sustainable manufacturing and zero carbon transport solution, EFI’s space saving trailer planning, will be a winning formula for future growth. Available as an integrated module to EFI Radius, trailer planning is designed to streamline and automate shipping processes and optimise your loads.

Learn More →

Estimating

EFI’s iQuote is a highly visual, web-based, JDF-compliant smart estimating software solution that supports all available and emerging technologies in the packaging industry.​ iQuote automates the process of picking the best path for a job through your plant by determining the most cost effective production route.

Learn More →

eCommerce& Collaboration

EFI MarketDirect PackCentral is an online customer ordering portal designed specifically for the requirements of packaging producers. Build and visualise products in powerful 3D tools and connect to EFI’s leading packaging ERP software to provide seamless order to production automation.

Learn More →

Shop Floor Data Collection

EFI Auto-Count® is an award-winning, patented, shop floor production intelligence​ platform that allows you to automatically collect accurate, up-to-the minute​ production data including counts, press status, speed and other critical information​ directly from your equipment in real-time.

Learn More →

Business Intelligence

Through an easy-to-use interface, decision-makers gain deep visibility into their business operations with EFI Business Intelligence software. Easily identify trends as they begin to appear, accurately forecast effects of changing variables, and implement proactive measures to maximise profit and efficiency.

Learn More →

Layout & Imposition

EFI Metrix® allows you to dramatically reduce planning and prepress labour cost and shorten job throughput. Metrix enables you to optimise your print tooling and reduce the number of colour changes.

Learn More →

Pre-Press Integration

EFI has successfully integrated with many industry leading 3rd party applications to compliment and enrich the pre-press workflow making it a true ‘end-to-end’ touchless solution.

Learn More →

Digital Printing

Enable digital transformation with EFI's fully integrated JDF workflow. Our end-to-end solution connects to EFI Fiery and other leading 3rd party Digital Front Ends giving our customers a customisable ‘lights out’ solution.

Learn More →

How Does Local Suite Work?

EFI’s end-to-end Packaging Software Suite offers packaging converters across the globe future-ready technology that enables them to reduce cost of sales, increase margins, and drive revenue. Learn how in our eBook.

Always-on EFI Cloud ready services

As an EFI cloud managed solution you won’t ever have to worry about MarketDirect server availability or uptime, you can focus on servicing your customers and your business. Our professional services team keep your solution up-to-date and running smoothly, alerting you to potential threats and providing 24/7 monitoring.
